<!--This file is generated-->

Fixes an error in 5.8 which can cause nested extensions to not be instantiated. Recommended for all users of 5.8.x.

<!--truncate-->

:::info Updates available

There are patches available for [this release](https://bud.js.org/releases/tags/5-8). Please update to [5.8.3](https://bud.js.org/releases/5.8.3).

:::

## Changes

- [fix(patch): instantiate nested extensions](https://github.com/roots/bud/pull/1411)

Also includes version bumps for a large number of dependencies. [Review what changed between v5.8.1 and v5.8.2 here](https://github.com/roots/bud/compare/v5.8.1...v5.8.2).
